content: introducing the simple striped cat hat these cat hats are super trendy right now with or without the folded-up brim i have it in three sizes toddler/preschool child/tweenie and teen/adult i have made this striped cat hat beanie crochet pattern as a simple pattern for beginners you can make a cat hat for all your cat loving friends with just the double_crochet stitch this hat is designed to fit snugly so the corners form ears when it is put on your head for those new to crochet i have a video on youtube 1 that shows how to make this hat without the stripes you will just need to add the extra row indicated in the pattern instructions here if you want the rolled-up brim so here we go good luck 1 https //youtu be/ewh92em2yjk si=jrb9irkufnpz1nr8
